content: Write a poem about stars using exactly 40 words.

Twinkle, twinkle, little stars,
In the velvet night they mars,
Guiding dreams, igniting sparks,
Each a story, each a mark.

Cosmic dance in silent sphere,
Wonders of the universe near,
Shining bright, without a care,
In the sky, they always share.

Eternal lights, forever young,
In the heavens, their song is sung.
